caller_intent: Julia sought assistance to obtain a business insurance quote for her fitness instructor work, specifically requesting a cheaper alternative to her current provider (K and K) due to high costs.
resolution_steps: Jessica confirmed Julia's need for general liability insurance for her fitness instructor business.
Asked for business details: business name (none, personal), location (Turkey Hill Road), and annual revenue (~$10k).
Provided a quote for a basic general liability policy at $250/year.
Noted Julia's current insurance with K and K and clarified she could keep her existing policy if the new quote wasn't better.
knowledge_required: Understanding of business insurance types (general liability, property coverage).
Ability to assess risk based on revenue and claims history.
Quote generation process for small businesses with low revenue.
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance systems (for pulling existing insurance records and generating quotes)
summary: Jessica from Alliance Insurance provided Julia with a $250/year general liability insurance quote for her fitness instructor business. After discussing details like revenue and claims history, Julia decided to keep her current insurance but appreciated the alternative option.
